data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ünal, Mustafa (2011): Taxonomic review of the subfamily Bradyporinae (Orthoptera: Tettigoniidae, Bradyporini, Ephippigerini) of Turkey, with description of new species and the relationship of the taxa. Zootaxa 2899: 1-42, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.207707
